snippet.title: What is DCA w/ Aleks (Amber) | Bitcoin Basics (71)
snippet.description:
* Please LIKE and SUBSCRIBE above
* Get started with Amber: https://getamber.io
* Click "SHOW MORE" below ...

"Why is Dollar Cost Averaging (DCA) the best way to buy bitcoin? Why is bitcoin the best form of money? Bitcoin vs Ethereum? All about Amber & Aleks"

00:00 Intro
01:35 Why do we need DCA (Dollar Cost Averaging)?
14:55 Bitcoin is the best form of money
26:32 About Amber, customers, getting started & custodianship
41:10 Why bitcoin?

Show page: https://coincompass.com/71

#bitcoin #ethereum #blockchain

EPISODE SHOW NOTES:
Get the Amber app: https://getamber.io
Aleks' articles: https://medium.com/@AleksSvetski
Aleks' Twitter: https://twitter.com/AleksSvetski
Bitcoin Dashboard: https://bitcoin.clarkmoody.com/dashboard

EPISODE ATTRIBUTION:
http://podsummit.com/freemusic

AFFILIATES: https://coincompass.com/affiliates are chosen because we use them as the best bitcoin products & services.https://coincompass.com/free

HELP US: https://coincompass.com/subscribe to keep all our educational content ad-free & if you received any value whatsoever we would appreciate a 5-star https://podcasts.apple.com/podcast/id1487421249 review.

SHARE US: https://coincompass.com/free for all our social media accounts & other free content including newsletters, eBooks, video guides, etc.

ASK US: http://coincompass.com/ask a question for our next Q&A / AMA episode.

ABOUT US: https://coincompass.com/about: enabling you to safely buy & securely store your bitcoins. We educate investors & create Bitcoin wealth management solutions. It is estimated over 7 million bitcoins have been lost or stolen. Learn how to keep yours safe by integrating InfoSec (Information Security), OpSec (Operational Security) & industry best practices enabling you to: safely buy, store & control your own private keys (bitcoins).
